subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Gerald Wallace signed a six-year, $57 million contract with the Charlotte Bobcats yesterday. Wallace’s deal includes incentives that could pay him up to an additional $2 million a season. Wallace averaged a team-best 18.1 points last season.
snippet: Gerald Wallace signed a six-year, $57 million contract with the Charlotte Bobcats yesterday. Wallace’s deal includes incentives that could pay him up to an additional $2 million a season. Wallace averaged a team-best 18.1 points last season.
